title: Erigon stuck? after mapping port, stat stuck on block=0 (mainnet)
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: `./erigon --version`

erigon version 2.28.1-stable-9711af6d

OS & Version: Windows/Linux/OSX
Linux Manjaro

#### Expected behaviour
Erigon Start syncing after I point CL towards it

#### Actual behaviour
Erigon stuck at block = 0

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour

Start Erigon
Point CL (prysm) towards it
wait
